chapter.text: 36|1|Jo, sin
36|2|Savgand ʙa Qur'oni hakim
36|3|Be tardid, tu az pajomʙaron [-i Mo] hasti
36|4|[Va] Bar rohi rost [Islom qaror dori]
36|5|[In Qur'on] Furufiristodai [Parvardigori] sikastnopaziri mehruʙon ast
36|6|To mardumero [dar ʙorai azoʙi qijomat] ʙim dihi, ki padaronason husdor najoftaand va [ʙad-in saʙaʙ] onho niz ƣofiland
36|7|Jaqinan, farmon [-i azoʙi ilohi] ʙar ʙestarason tahaqquq joftaast; pas, [lacocat mekunand va] imon nameovarand

36|8|[Misoli gumrohii kofiron, cunon ast, ki gui] Mo ʙar gardanhojason zancirhoe nihodaem, ki to zeri manahojason [pecidasuda] ast, cunonki sarhojason ʙolo mondaast [va az ancomi har xajre ocizand va rohi hidojatro namejoʙand]
36|9|Va az pesi rujason devore va az pusti sarason niz devore nihodaem va casmonasonro ʙo pardae pusonidaem; az in rust, ki [haqiqatro] nameʙinand
36|10|[Ej pajomʙar] ʙarojason jakson ast, ki ononro ʙim dihi jo nadihi; [dar har hol] imon nameovarand

36|11|Cuz in nest, ki tu ʙa kase ʙim medihi [va in kor ʙaroi kase sud dorad], ki pajravi Qur'on ʙosad va dar nihon az [Parvardigori] Rahmon ʙitarsad; pas, Uro [ki cunin ast] ʙa omurzis va podosi arcmand ʙasorat ʙideh
36|12|Jaqinan, Moem, ki murdagonro zinda mekunem va on ciro, ki az pes firistodaand va osori [ʙoqimonda az] esonro menavisem; va hama cizro dar Kitoʙi ravsan [Lavh-ul-mahfuz] ʙa sumor ovardaem
36|13|[Ej pajomʙar] ʙarojason [mocaroi] mardumi on sahrro misol ʙizan, on goh ki pajomʙaron nazdason raftand

36|14|Va vaqte du nafar az pajomʙaronro ʙa sujason firistodem; ammo [mardum] ononro duruƣgu angostand; pas, ʙo firistodani pajomʙari savum on duro [ta'jid va] taqvijat kardem. Onon [ʙa aholii sahr] meguftand: «Mo firistodagon [-i ilohi] ʙa sui sumo hastem»
36|15|[Onon dar posux] guftand: «Sumo cuz ʙasare hammonandi mo nested va [Parvardigori] Rahmon cize [az vahj] nozil nakardaast. Sumo cuz duruƣ namegued»
36|16|[Pajomʙaron] guftand: «Parvardigoramon medonad, ki qat'an, ʙa suji sumo firistoda sudaem
36|17|Va mo vazifae cuz rasonidani oskor [-i vahj] nadorem»
36|18|[Mardum] Guftand: «Mo sumoro ʙa foli ʙad giriftaem. Agar [az taʙliƣ] dast ʙarnadored, hatman, sangsoraton mekunem va ʙe tardid, azoʙi dardnoke az [coniʙi] mo ʙa sumo xohad rasid»

36|19|[Pajomʙaron] Guftand: «Sumii sumo ʙo xudaton [va nosi az kufru gunoh] ast. Ojo agar pandaton dihand, [onro sum mepindored?] ʙalki [haqiqat in ast, ki sumo dar irtikoʙi gunoh] mardumi isrofkored»
36|20|Va marde az durtarin nuqtai sahr sitoʙon omad [va] guft: «Ej qavmi man, az in pajomʙaron pajravi kuned»
36|21|Pajravi kasone ʙosed, ki az sumo podose namexohand va xud hidojat joftaand
36|22|Va caro ma'ʙudero naparastam, ki maro ofaridaast va [sumo niz] ʙa sujas ʙozgardonda mesaved
36|23|Ojo ʙa coi U ma'ʙudone ʙarguzinam, ki agar [Parvardigori] Rahmon ʙixohad, gazande ʙa man ʙirasonad, na safoatason ʙarojam sude dorad va na metavonand [az azoʙi ilohi] nacotam dihand
36|24|Dar on surat, jaqinan, dar gumrohii oskore xoham ʙud
36|25|Man ʙa Parvardigoraton imon ovardaam [va az marg harose nadoram] pas, suxanonamro ʙisunaved
36|26|[Pas, cun on mard ʙa dasti qavmas ʙa sahodat rasid] Ba vaj gufta sud: «Voridi ʙihist sav». U guft: «Ej kos, qavmi man medonistand
36|27|ki Parvardigoram maro omurzida va giromi dostaast»
36|28|Pas az [sahodati] u ʙar qavmas hec sipohe az osmon nafiristodem va [pes az in niz] furu firistanda naʙudem
36|29|[Kajfarason] Cuz jak ʙongi margʙor naʙud; pas, ʙa nogoh hamagi [murda va] xomus gastand
36|30|Ej afsus, ʙar in ʙandagon! Hec pajomʙare ʙa sujason najomad, magar on ki masxaraas mekardand
36|31|Ojo nadidand [va namedonand] ki qaʙl az onon ci ʙisjor naslhoro halok kardaem, ki digar nazdi inho [ʙa dunjo] ʙoznamegardand
36|32|Va [ruzi qijomat] hec kas nest, magar on ki hamagi nazdi Mo ehzor mesavand
36|33|Baroi onon [ki qijomatro ʙovar nadorand] zamini xusk nisonae [iʙratomuz] ast: Mo on [zamin]-ro zinda kardem va az [xoki] on donahoe rujonidem, ki [maxluqoti ilohi] az on mexurand
36|34|Va dar on [zamin] ʙoƣhoe az naxl va angur padid ovardem va dar on casmaho ravon soxtem
36|35|To mardum az mevaas ʙixurand, dar hole ki in [mahsulot, hosili talosi onho nest va onho]-ro ʙo dastoni xud amal naovardaand. Pas, ojo sipos nameguzorand
36|36|Pok va munazzah ast, on [Parvardigore] ki hamai naru modahoro ofarida ast; az on ci zamin merujonad [gijohonu daraxton] va az xudason [insonho] va az on ci namedonand
36|37|Va saʙ ʙaroi onon nisonae [digar az qudrati ilohi] ast, [ki] ruzro az on ʙarkanor mekunem va nogahon [hama] dar toriki furu meravand
36|38|Va xursed [niz pajvasta] ʙa suji qarorgohas dar harakat ast. In taqdiri [Parvardigori] sikastnopaziru donost
36|39|Va ʙaroi moh [niz] manzilgohhoe muqarrar namudaem, to [sarancom az qursi komil ʙa hilol va] ʙa sakli soxai xuski xurmo ʙozgardad
36|40|Na xursedro sazovor ast, ki [dar sajri xud] ʙa moh ʙirasad v na saʙ ʙar ruz pesi megirad; va har jak az [sitoravu sajjora] dar madore sinovarand
36|41|Nisonae [digar az qudrati Parvardigor] ʙaroi onon in ast, ki padaronasonro dar kisti anʙosta [az sarnisin va ʙor] haml kardem
36|42|Hamcunin, ʙarojason cize hammonandi on [kisti] ofaridaem, ki savoras savand
36|43|Agar ʙixohem, ƣarqason mekunem; dar in surat, na farjodrase dorand va na [az taqdiri ilohi] rahoi mejoʙand
36|44|Magar in ki rahmate az coniʙi Mo [ʙinand] va ʙahramandi [az ne'mathoi dunjo] to zamone [muajjan somili holason savad]

36|45|Va cun ʙa onon [musrikon] gufta mesavad: «Az on ci pesorui sumost [azoʙi oxirat] va on ci pusti sar meguzored [saxtihoi dunjo] parvo kuned; ʙosad, ki mavridi rahmat qaror gired», [itoat namekunand]
36|46|Hec nisonae az nisonahoi [qudrat va ʙuzurgii] Parvardigorason ʙar onon arza namegardad, magar on ki az on ruj megardonand

36|47|Va cun ʙa onon gufta mesavad: «Az on ci Alloh taolo ruzijaton kardaast, infoq kuned», kasone, ki kufr varzidaand, ʙa onon, ki imon ovardaand megujand: «Ojo ʙa kase ƣizo ʙidihem, ki agar Alloh taolo mexost, [Xud] ʙa u ƣizo medod? Sumo cuz dar gumrohii oskor nested»
36|48|Va [ʙo tamasxur ʙa mu'minon] megujand: «Agar rostgued, in va'da [qijomat] kaj xohad ʙud»
36|49|[In munkironi qijomat] cuz dar intizori jak ʙongi margʙor nestand, ki nogahon, dar hole ki sargarmi cidol [dar umuri dunjo] hastand, ononro faro girad
36|50|Pas, [dar on hangom] nametavonand [ʙa kase] vasijat kunand va na ʙa sui xonavodai xud ʙozgardand
36|51|Va [hangome ki ʙaroi duvumin ʙor] dar sur damida savad va nogahon az qaʙrhojason [ʙerun meojand va] ʙa sui Parvardigorason mesitoʙand

36|52|[Va ʙo noʙovari] Megujand: «Voj ʙar mo! Ci kase moro az qaʙrhojamon ʙarangext?» [Ba onon gufta mesavad] «In hamon [ruze] ast, ki [Parvardigori] Rahmon va'da doda ʙud; va pajomʙaron [dar in ʙora] rost meguftand
36|53|[Barangextani murdagon az gur] Cuz jak ʙongi havlnok [duvumin damidani sur] nest va nogahon hamaro nazdi Mo hozir mekunand
36|54|Pas, [ʙidoned, ki] imruz, ʙa hec kas sitame namesavad va cuz dar ʙaroʙari on ci [dar dunjo] kardaed, cazo nameʙined
36|55|Be tardid, ahli ʙihist imruz ʙo sodmoni sargarm [-i ne'mathoi ilohi] hastand
36|56|Onon va hamsaronason dar sojaho [-i gusturdai ʙihisti] ʙar taxtho takja zadaand
36|57|Dar on co [har guna] meva va har ci ʙixohand, ʙarojason [faroham] hast
36|58|[Bartar az in ne'matho] salomest, ki suxani Parvardigori mehruʙon ast
36|59|[On goh ʙa musrikon xitoʙ mesavad] «Ej gunahkoron, imruz [az mu'minon] cudo saved
36|60|Ej farzandoni Odam, ojo ʙo sumo pajmon naʙastam [va farmon nadodam], ki sajtonro naparasted, [ki] qat'an u dusmani oskori sumost
36|61|Va in ki [tanho] Maro ʙiparasted, [ki] rohi rost hamin ast
36|62|Va ʙe tardid, sajton ʙisjore az sumoro gumroh soxt. Ojo andesa namekarded
36|63|In [hamon] duzaxest, ki ʙa sumo va'da doda mesud
36|64|Imruz ʙa sazoi on ki kufr mevarzided, ʙa on [otas] vorid saved»
36|65|Imruz ʙar dahonhojason muhr menihem va dasthojason ʙo Mo suxan megujand va pojhojason ʙa on ci mekardand, guvohi medihand
36|66|Va agar ʙixohem, ʙe tardid, casmonasonro mahv mekunem, pas, [ʙo casmi ʙasta] ʙa suji [puli] sirot [az jakdigar] pesi megirand [to ʙa ʙihist roh joʙand]; ammo magar kucoro meʙinand
36|67|Va agar ʙixohem [zohirasonro taƣjir medihem va cunon] ononro dar coi xud masx [va zamingir] mekunem, ki natavonand gome ʙa pes ʙiguzorand jo ʙa aqiʙ ʙozgardand
36|68|Va Mo ʙa har ki umri tuloni ʙidihem, dar ofarinis digargunas mekunem [va uro ʙa notavonii zehni va ʙadani davroni kudaki ʙarmegardonem]. Pas, ojo [dar ʙorai qudrati Parvardigor] nameandesand
36|69|Va Mo ʙa u [Muhammad] se'r naomuxtaem va [soiri] soistai u nest. In [ki omuxtaem, cize] nest, magar andarz va Qur'one ravsan
36|70|To har kiro zinda [-dil] ʙosad, ʙim dihad va azoʙ ʙar kofiron muhaqqaq gardad
36|71|Ojo nadidaand, ki Mo az on ci dasthojamon soxtaast, cahorpojone ʙarojason ofaridaem, ki moliki onho hastand
36|72|Va onhoro dar xidmati eson guzostaem, to ʙar ʙarxe savor savand va az [gusti] ʙarxe taƣzija kunand
36|73|Va az on [hajvonot] ʙahrahoi digar va nusidanihoe [sir] dorand. Pas, ojo sipos nameguzorand
36|74|[Bo in hama ne'mat musrikon] ʙa coi Alloh taolo ma'ʙudone ʙarguzidaand; ʙa in umed, ki [az suji onho] jori savand
36|75|On [ma'ʙudhoi ʙecon] qodir ʙa joriason nestand; va in [musrikon dar qijomat] laskare ʙaroi onho [ʙutho] xohand ʙud, ki [hamagi dar otasi duzax] ehzor mesavand
36|76|[Ej Pajomʙar] suxani onon turo ƣamgin nasozad. Be tardid, Mo on ciro pinhon mekunand va oskor mesozand, [ʙa xuʙi] medonem
36|77|Ojo inson nadidaast, ki Mo uro az nutfae ofaridaem [on goh marohili rusdro taj kard va] sipas dusmane oskor sud
36|78|Va ʙaroi Mo misole zad va ofarinisi xesro faromus kard [va] guft: «Ci kase in ustuxonhoro [duʙora] zinda mekunad, dar hole ki pusidaast?»
36|79|Bigu: «hamon kase zindaas mekunad, ki naxustin ʙor onro padid ovard va U ʙa har ofarinise donost
36|80|Hamon ki az daraxti saʙz otase ʙarojaton padid ovard va sumo [dar surati nijoz] xud az on [daraxt] otas meafruzed»
36|81|Ojo kase, ki osmonho va zaminro ofaridaast, nametavonad hammonandi inhoro [pas az margason duʙora] ʙiofarinad? Ore [metavonad] va U Ofarinandai donost
36|82|Farmoni U cun cizero iroda kunad, tanho in ast, ki ʙa on megujad: «Mavcud sav»; pas, [ʙedirang] mavcud mesavad
36|83|Pas, pok va munazzah ast Parvardigore, ki [hokimijat va] ixtijori hama ciz ʙa dasti Ust va [hamagi] ʙa sui U ʙozgardonida mesaved
